venue.address_2: Rose Performance Hall, Heftler Visiting Artist Gallery
venue.name: Center for the Arts at Endicott College

item.description:
When: Sunday, March 7, at 2:00p.m.
Where:
Center for the Arts at Endicott College
376 Hale Street
Beverly, MA 01915

Annie Leibovitz: Women, a collection of 35 larger-than-life photos from world-renowned photographer Annie Leibovitz opens at the Heftler Visiting Artist Gallery at Endicott College, Center for the Arts. A traveling exhibit from The Womenâ€™s Museum: An Institute for the Future in Dallas, Texas, offers gallery visitors striking images of women from a broad spectrum of society, including actresses, astronauts, athletes, farmers, musicians, showgirls, and political figures.

Ticket / Registration Details:
This event is free and open to the public.


For those interested, we'll meetup afterwards to discuss the exhibit over lunch. Location tbd.
item.name: Annie Leibovitz: Women at Endicott College
